2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Yaaay!!!!!! So excited this actually works with the TBB using Antergos.

2_1JHumjFpXMTtSgm1ygdHqsvL9321Z87NDc.body: Definitely Linux. So far the latest Znet is surprisingly fast with a new ssd laptop even with Tor on. As of now, my favorite distro is Arch for it's speed and convenience even though Debian distros are more stable for newcomers since more things tend to work out of the box. Solus OTOH looks like a balance between fast and stable.
